value.stringValue: {"mentions":[],"message":"@[{![Opportunity].OwnerId}]. Ha sido asignado propietario de la oportunidad: {![Opportunity].Name}"}
@[{!myVariable_current.OwnerId}]. Ha sido asignado propietario de la oportunidad: {!myVariable_current.Name}

rules.name: myRule_26
rules.label: Policy number or apllication number is changed ?

value.stringValue: IF ( CONTAINS ( [Opportunity].Name,'UoW Test'), [Opportunity].Name, [Opportunity].Account.FirstName & " " & [Opportunity].Account.LastName & " [" & TEXT([Opportunity].line_insurance__c ) & "] " & IF( ISNULL( [Opportunity].main_opportunity__c ), "" , "* " ) & LEFT([Opportunity].risk_description__c, 50) )
